node.done()

Set sensor value on bridge
Write data
prepare write data

SPS Error
Set value
Parse GPS
GPS Error
Set Static value on bridge
Toolbar - Summary
nodes.format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">
    $('#text0').remove();
    $('#div0').remove();
    var div0 = $('<div/ id="div0">');
    var p0 = $('<p/ id="text0">');
    p0.text("Lad.: ---");
    div0.append(p0);
    div0[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px 5px';

    $('#text1').remove();
    $('#div1').remove();
    var div1 = $('<div/ id="div1">');
    var p1 = $('<p/ id="text1">');
    p1.text("Bat.: ---");
    div1.append(p1);
    div1[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px 5px';

    $('#text2').remove();
    $('#div2').remove();
    var div2 = $('<div/ id="div2">');
    var p2 = $('<p/ id="text2">');
    p2.text("Status:");
    div2.append(p2);
    div2[0].style.margin = '5px 0px 5px 5px';

    $('#div3').remove();
    var div3 = $('<div/ id="div3">');
    div3[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px 5px';
    div3[0].style.width = '15px';
    div3[0].style.height = '15px';
    div3[0].style.border = '2px solid white';
    div3[0].style["border-radius"] = '8px';
    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#0bff01';

    $('#logoId').remove();
    var div5 = $('<div/ id="logoId">');
    var p5 = new Image();
    p5.src = 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
    p5.height = 40;
    div5[0].style.margin = 'auto 10px auto auto';
    div5.append(p5);
    
    function displayText0(text) {
        p0.text("Lad.: " + text);
    }
    function displayText1(lh) {
        p1.text("Bat.: " + text);
    }
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            if(data && data["LADUNG"]){
                displayText0(data["LADUNG"]);
            }
            if(data && data["BATTERIE"]){
                displayText1(data["BATTERIE"]);
            }
            if(data && data["SYSTEM-0"]){
                if(data["SYSTEM-0"] === 0) {
                    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#0bff01';
                } else if(data["SYSTEM-0"] === 1) {
                    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#fdfe02';
                }else if(data["SYSTEM-0"] === 2) {
                    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#fe0000';
                }
            }
        });
    })(scope);

    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    toolbar.append(div2);
    toolbar.append(div3);
    toolbar.append(div0);
    toolbar.append(div1);
    toolbar.append(div5);

    $('link[rel="shortcut icon"]').attr('href','data:image/png;base64,');
    $('link[rel="icon"]').attr('href', 'data:image/png;base64,');
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("title").text('Triopan AG');
    });
</script>

    var p2 = $('<p/ id="text2">');

    div3[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px 5px';
    div3[0].style.width = '15px';
    div3[0].style.height = '15px';
    div3[0].style.border = '2px solid white';
    div3[0].style["border-radius"] = '8px';
    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#0bff01';

    $('#logoId').remove();
    var div5 = $('<div/ id="logoId">');
    var p5 = new Image();
    p5.src = 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
    p5.height = 40;
    div5[0].style.margin = 'auto 10px auto auto';
    div5.append(p5);
    
    function displayText0(text) {
        p0.text("Lad.: " + text);
    }
    function displayText1(lh) {
        p1.text("Bat.: " + text);
    }
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            if(data && data["LADUNG"]){
                displayText0(data["LADUNG"]);
            }
            if(data && data["BATTERIE"]){
                displayText1(data["BATTERIE"]);
            }
            if(data && data["SYSTEM-0"]){
                if(data["SYSTEM-0"] === 0) {
                    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#0bff01';
                } else if(data["SYSTEM-0"] === 1) {
                    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#fdfe02';
                }else if(data["SYSTEM-0"] === 2) {
                    div3[0].style["background-color"] = '#fe0000';
                }

        });
    })(scope);

    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    toolbar.append(div2);
    toolbar.append(div3);
    toolbar.append(div0);
    toolbar.append(div1);
    toolbar.append(div5);

    $('link[rel="shortcut icon"]').attr('href','data:image/png;base64,');
    $('link[rel="icon"]').attr('href', 'data:image/png;base64,');
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("title").text('Triopan AG');
    });
</script>
